name: Disney Extravaganza
description:
This summer we have included a special dance opportunity in our Disney Extravaganza Camp! We are offering another chance to dance and have fun with an array of amazing Disney Characters! Come dressed as your favorite Disney Character to this very special camp. We will have a differenttheme each day for featuring characters, dance classes, crafts, and activities!

Day 1: The Lion King
Day 2: Aladdin
Day 3: Mickey Mouse
Day 4: Zootopia
Day 5: Minions

name: Unicorns, Mermaids & Dragons
description: Do you love magic, rainbows and sparkles too? Do you love Dragons!! This camp was inspired by our Award Winning float in the Flamborough Santa Claus Parade. Campers will enjoy a themed week of dancing, activities, crafts and games!

name: TIK TOK - Dance, Create, Elevate!
description: TIK TOK Dance Workshop AMAZING OPPORTUNITY! Are you Tik Tok crazy? Do you love to dance? Join us for a week long summer camp learning how to do some of your favorite TIK TOK dances and learn and create with our Tik Tok Star Special guest Eleanor Rattenbury who will be joining us LIVE from England!! You will learn some amazing TIK TOK routines and be invited to duet with our special guest from across the world. Spots are limited so don’t miss this amazing opportunity!

name: Perfectly Princess Experience - Join the Royal Ball!
description:
Our Perfectly Princess Experiences are so popular and exciting that we are back with more!!! Come dressed as your favorite Princess or Prince to this very special camp. Featured characters include Moana, Belle, Ariel, Jasmine and Cinderella from the Magic Kingdom! Enjoy a week-long camp that will include Princess/Prince themed ballet classes as well as jazz, Acro, and Hip Hop classes too. Campers will also take part in themed crafts and games, princess makeover day, and a special princess tea party with Princess Belle from Beauty and the Beast! This camp is a perfect way to introduce dance to the newest little dancers and to make our Royal Entrance!

Day 1: Princess Belle and the Beast
Day 2: Princess Jasmine and Aladdin
Day 3: Princess Ariel and Prince Eric
Day 4: 4-Princess Cinderella and Prince Charming
Day 5: Queen Elsa and Princess Anna

name: Tumble & Groove - Make Your Move! - Acro & Hip Hop Combo
description:
Welcome to a full week of adventure that focuses on the amazing hip hop skills all morning and acro-jazz in the afternoon!

Campers will have fun learning new hip hop skills: popping, locking, tutting, krumping, and other hip hop styles. In the afternoon, campers will learn Acro skills in our dance studios on our state-of-the-art sprung floors and in our beautiful gymnastics facility. Acro skills include bridges, walkovers, cartwheels, aerials, handsprings etc. These two genres complement each other greatly and will make for a fun-filled week learning special choreography!

name: Trolls World Tour
description: It’s time to Get Back Up for TROLLS WORLD TOUR DANCE CAMP! Travel around the world through song and dance! Come learn about different styles of dance from all over the world! African, Irish, Step, Hawaiian ,Bollywood, Salsa as well as jazz, Ballet, Acro, Hip Hop and so much more! A summer camp experience that is sure to enhance your knowledge of the world of dance with a huge emphasis on FUN! Join us for a fun-filled week of dancing around the forest and enjoying themed activities, crafts, games and more. It's time to dance around the world... Troll style!

name: Disney Zombies
description: Join us during our fun filled week of Disney Zombie Dance Camp!!! Explore the Zombie world and learn songs and dances from the Disney movie!!!! Campers will create cool crafts and take part in fun activities throughout the week!! Get your Zombie walk ready for this fun camp!! We are about to go on a wild Zombie Dance Adventure!

name: Mini Pops - Become a Pop Star
description:
Have you always wanted to reach the STARS with your talents? Now is your chance in our “one of a kind” camp! Campers will sing, dance, and act to stardom! Each student will have the opportunity to learn dance choreography and song lyrics for an exciting music video and meet a real Mini Pop Artist!!!

How We’ll Have Fun:
  • Dance classes in jazz, acro and hip hop
  • Singing techniques and fun karaoke sessions
  • Record our music video song as a group
  • Take professional headshots on our "Glamour Day" (complete with makeup)
  • Learn acting techniques and work on a Commercial to present
  • Fun crafts: making microphones, CD necklaces, VIP passes, bios and biography writing
  • Walk the "Red Carpet" at our end of week Gala

name: Frozen Fantasy Dance Camp
description: Would you like to meet the REAL Queen Elsa? How about Olaf? Well, Queen Elsa and friends would LOVE to meet YOU! And they would be sooo excited to dance with you as well! Queen Elsa has launched Frozen 2 and she would love to sing and dance with you. Campers will have fun learning Ballet, Jazz, Acro, and Hip Hop. Our week of dance camp will also include themed crafts, games and other awesome activities that take us on an icy, FROZEN adventure!

name: Unicorns, Mermaids & Dragons
description: Do you love magic, rainbows and sparkles too? Do you love Dragons!! This camp was inspired by our Award Winning float in the Flamborough Santa Claus Parade. Campers will enjoy a themed week of dancing, activities, crafts and games!

name: Summer Adventures
description:
Kick off the start to your summer this year with The Dream Centre. Our Summer Adventure week will be a full array of sports, activities, and games for your children to enjoy.

This week includes:
  • Learn some cool Gymnastics Tricks
  • Focused class time on the Vault, Uneven Bars, Balance Beam, Floor Exercise and Trampolines
  • Outdoor and Indoor games
  • Play on our new Ninja Warrior Equipment
  • Martial Arts sessions with an experienced instructor
  • Themed arts & crafts
  • Adventurous activities including a summer scavenger hunt

Our daily activities are coached and supervised by experienced and exceptional TDC staff and we cannot wait to see you!

name: Jurassic Park
description:
It is Dinosaur frenzy at TDC this week and we have so much planned for you. We will do some themed crafts, games and activities and will still have lots of time to play on the equipment in the gym. Stay tuned for a surprise visit from our very own Dino The Dinosaur!

This week includes:
  • Outdoor and Indoor dinosaur games
  • Interactive activities including a dinosaur disco dance party!
  • Play on our Gymnastics Equipment
  • Focused class time on the Vault, Uneven Bars, Balance Beam, Floor Exercise and Trampolines
  • Explore our new Ninja Warrior Equipment
  • Themed crafts all about the Jurassic era
  • Surprise visit from Dino the Dinosaur!

Our daily activities are all coached and supervised by experienced and exceptional TDC staff. Let us get this party started!

name: All Stars Sports
description:
It is sports week, and we are getting ready for the TDC Sports Extravaganza. For 4 days we will practice our favourite sports and on Friday we will show off what our best tricks are with an amazing "Show and Tell" celebration. Everyone will get a chance to show off their skills and cheer other teammates on.

This week includes:
  • Outdoor sports including soccer and relay
  • Indoor sports including Gymnastics, Ninja Warrior & Martial Arts
  • A surprise dance session with one of our experienced TDC Dance instructors
  • Focused class time on the Vault, Uneven Bars, Balance Beam, Floor Exercise and Trampolines
  • End of week "Show & Tell" at our Friday Sports Extravaganza
  • Themed crafts, games, and activities

Our daily activities are coached and supervised by experienced and exceptional TDC staff. This week is going to be a blast and we hope to see you at All Star Sports Week.

name: Wild Water Works
description:
It is hot out there, so we are cooling it down with Wild Water Week! This week we will be incorporating water activities and games for your children to enjoy. Bring a swimsuit and/or a change of clothes so they can take part in the full experience.

This week includes:
  • Themed games such a Water Sponge Tag
  • Outdoor playtime with water balloons and other fun activities
  • A surprise dance session with one of our experienced TDC Dance instructors
  • Learn some cool Gymnastics Tricks
  • Focused class time on the Vault, Uneven Bars, Balance Beam, Floor Exercise and Trampolines
  • Explore our new Ninja Warrior Equipment

name: Spectacular Space and Science
description:
Come and explore some space activities and games with us at TDC this week! We are putting our goggles on and gearing up for some "out of this world" science experiments. We will make some time to learn some new Ninja Warrior and Gymnastics moves as well as craft time.

This week includes:
  • "Out of this world" science experiments
  • Gymnastics Moves & Tricks
  • Focused class time on the Vault, Uneven Bars, Balance Beam, Floor Exercise and Trampolines
  • Play on the Ninja Warrior Equipment
  • Themed Crafts & Activities both indoors & outdoors
  • Martial Arts sessions with our experienced Martial Arts Instructor

name: The Great Outdoors
description:
Are you ready to go on an adventure at TDC camp this week? We will be exploring the outdoors and experiencing nature together. Come join us for some camp themed activities & games.

This week includes:
  • Scavenger hunts
  • A supervised nature walk
  • Nature crafts both indoors and outdoors
  • Martial Arts sessions with our experienced Martial Arts Instructor
  • Instructed class time on our Ninja Warrior & Gymnastics equipment
  • Focused class time on the Vault, Uneven Bars, Balance Beam, Floor Exercise and Trampolines
  • Dance session with one of our experienced TDC Dance instructors
  • Camp & Outdoor themed activities & games

name: Jungle Safari
description:
Come join us this week on a safari adventure through the TDC jungle. We will be making a fort and living just like the animals so be sure to dress up as your favourite jungle animal. We cannot wait to see you swinging like monkeys in our jungle sanctuary.

This week includes:
  • Live like the Jungle animals - Make a fort
  • Time to learn Gymnastics Moves & Tricks
  • Focused class time on the Vault, Uneven Bars, Balance Beam, Floor Exercise and Trampolines
  • Jungle themed crafts
  • Animal activities & games
  • Martial Arts sessions with an experienced instructor
  • Class time on our Ninja Warrior equipment which will be our jungle sanctuary for the week

name: Slip & Slide Through Summer
description:
It's our last week at TDC Summer Camp and we are slipping and sliding our way through the week. Bring your bathing suit this week because we can promise that you are going to get wet. Come and enjoy some indoor and outdoor water games and finish off the summer with a BANG!

This week includes:
  • Outdoor water activities
  • Learn some new Gymnastics moves & tricks
  • Focused class time on the Vault, Uneven Bars, Balance Beam, Floor Exercise and Trampolines
  • Themed activities and games
  • Martial Arts sessions with an experienced instructor
  • Outdoor Slip & Slide if weather permits
  • Play on our Ninja Warrior equipment
  • Dance session with one of our experienced TDC Dance instructors
  • End of summer "Show & Tell"

name: Jedi Training Camp
description: Our martial artists dive into their skills this week, focusing on agility, self-defense and teamwork! Spin a bo like Rey, fight off the Stormtroopers with your powerful kicks, and find your inner confidence with Yoda-inspired strength. No martial arts necessary experience, we all work together to become our best inner Jedis.

name: Super Heroes & Villains
description: Our Martial Artists know that confidence, teamwork, and ninja skills can defeat any evil Villain! Amongst other challenges, we will learn to use Nunchucks like the ninja turtles, leap like spiderman, block like we're wielding Thor's shield, and smash through boards like the Hulk. No Martial Arts experience necessary, we all have a place at this hero academy!

name: Musical Theatre Camp "Newsies"
description: Discover the world of ‘Newsies’ during our week long Musical Theatre Camp!!! Campers will learn singing, dancing and acting skills during this fun filled week!!! Do you know how to create and put together a set for the stage!? We’ll teach you what it takes to put together a live show!! Campers will explore the building blocks of musical theatre and participate in fun activities! Join us for an amazing and fun week!

name: Summer Adventures
description:
Kick off the start to your summer this year with The Dream Centre. Our Summer Adventure week will be a full array of sports, activities, and games for your children to enjoy.

This week includes:
  • Play on our new Ninja Warrior Equipment
  • Focused class time on the Warped Wall, Ninja Course, Rings, Ropes, Bars, Floor, Trampolines and so much more
  • Outdoor and Indoor games
  • Learn some cool Gymnastics Tricks
  • Martial Arts sessions with an experienced instructor

name: Competitive Intensive
description: Our Dance Intensive is designed for the serious, dedicated dancer who is interested in being a part of one of our Award Winning Competitive or Pre-Competitive Dance Teams in the upcoming season. Dancers will participate in Ballet, Jazz, Acro, Lyrical, Contemporary, Tap, Hip Hop and Improvisation classes, as well as Stretch and Conditioning, and Tumbling Classes in our gymnastics facility with National Level Coaches. This camp is mandatory for any new or returning dancer wishing to audition for one of our teams. Come and train with our Award Winning Dance and Fitness Faculty, and amazing special guest choreographers from throughout North America.
